metaface.server
Class MetaFaceService

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      metaface.server.MetaFaceService
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
MetaFaceDynamicService, MetaFaceStaticService
public abstract class MetaFaceService
extends Thread

This class provides the basis for client services. It may be extended to offer a particular service to clients.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Simon Beard
See Also:
HTTPClient, MetaFaceHTTPClient, MetaFaceHTTPServer
